Sequence Information.Source: sequence reversal, sequence shuffling, designed, man-made sequences

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (60%) toLL-10+F=W=K=R: 20. GRAVY: -0.96, mol Wt: 1423.723; mol formula: C72H104N20O11; mol ex coeff: 11100.Activity: active against  S. aureus USA300 MRSA (MIC 8 uM), S. epidermidis 1457 (MIC 32 uM), P. aeruginosa E411-17 (MIC 4 ug/ml), E. coli E423-17 (MIC 4 uM), and A. baumannii B28-16 (MIC 32 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Mechesso AF, Zhang W, Su Y, Xie J, Wang G. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Segment-Based Peptide Design Reveals the Importance of N-Terminal High Cationicity for Antimicrobial Activity Against Gram-Negative Pathogens.
